title: [Large-Scale] AI-Collaboration-Based Higher Education Instructional Design Task Development

context.prior_knowledge: Core principles of instructional design, foundational concepts of educational technology, and experience in designing assessment rubrics
context.additional_context: Utilizing AI tools (ChatGPT) as supplementary aids to complete instructional design tasks in smartphone-based limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners will be able to complete instructional design tasks (including needs analysis, task analysis, and learner analysis) that meet expert evaluation criteria through AI collaboration.
Learners will be able to develop customized instructional design documents reflecting the unique characteristics of educational institutions by revising and supplementing AI-generated results.
Learners will be able to diagnose the qualitative level of instructional design outputs and derive improvement plans through rubric-based self-assessment.

resources: Access rights to AI language models (e.g., ChatGPT)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
